thread.section_title: Travel news, tips and features - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Basque Country is Europe’s premium blend
thread.title_full: Basque Country is Europe’s premium blend - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rick Steves
title: Basque Country is Europe’s premium blend
text:
Photo: Rick Steves San Sebastián's Old Town provides the ideal backdrop for tapas-hopping; just wander the streets and sidle up to a bar piled with tiny snacks. San Sebastián's Old Town provides the ideal backdrop for...
The land of the Basque people, split between Spain and France, is a “nation without a state” — left off the map when they drew Europe’s national borders. The Basque Country is often left out of travel itineraries too, and that’s a mistake. With sunny beaches, spectacular modern architecture, tasty tapas, and feisty, free-spirited people, this region is filled with cultural treats. San Sebastián's Old Town provides the ideal backdrop for tapas-hopping; just wander the streets and sidle up to a bar piled with tiny snacks.
